channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description: @HejM0 @swaggoner @ArmyInLondon @Lionesses Then mine would be 1950 😛
item.source:markdown: @HejM0 @swaggoner @ArmyInLondon @Lionesses Then mine would be 1950 😛

item.description: @HejM0 @ArmyInLondon @Lionesses I just hope the goal line technology works better than the last time Germany played England in a final at Wembley #1966
item.source:markdown: @HejM0 @ArmyInLondon @Lionesses I just hope the goal line technology works better than the last time Germany played England in a final at Wembley #1966

item.description: @c0urtneyH I won’t say my wife dislikes Lufthansa, but the moment she no longer had to fly them for business she cut up her Senator Card and cashed in her miles on luggage, not flights
item.source:markdown: @c0urtneyH I won’t say my wife dislikes Lufthansa, but the moment she no longer had to fly them for business she cut up her Senator Card and cashed in her miles on luggage, not flights

item.description: @LostInThePondUS Nice try… are you aware that we are actually cousins twice removed? 😛
item.source:markdown: @LostInThePondUS Nice try… are you aware that we are actually cousins twice removed? 😛

item.description: Does anyone else bring Dairy Queen spoons back to Germany, or just us? (Only two are from this year) https://t.co/U5wDJqUZm6
item.source:markdown: Does anyone else bring Dairy Queen spoons back to Germany, or just us? (Only two are from this year) https://t.co/U5wDJqUZm6

item.description: @tessaapproves @Heather_inDE @MCinHD @Lynn_Nothegger We’ll, you could put brick on an inside wall like we did in our dining area. Except it’s not brick, it’s 3-D effect wallpaper 😂😂😂 https://t.co/xZtemINQrg
item.source:markdown: @tessaapproves @Heather_inDE @MCinHD @Lynn_Nothegger We’ll, you could put brick on an inside wall like we did in our dining area. Except it’s not brick, it’s 3-D effect wallpaper 😂😂😂 https://t.co/xZtemINQrg

item.description: @Lynn_Nothegger You could also think of this as a map where the train makes more sense than flying (time-wise, not climate-wise). We use 5 hours as our guide (for us, any large German city except Stuttgart or Munich).
item.source:markdown: @Lynn_Nothegger You could also think of this as a map where the train makes more sense than flying (time-wise, not climate-wise). We use 5 hours as our guide (for us, any large German city except Stuttgart or Munich).

item.description: @cncx I’d say “bitchmittens” is more badass than disrespectful, but I guess it depends on how the cat sees it
item.source:markdown: @cncx I’d say “bitchmittens” is more badass than disrespectful, but I guess it depends on how the cat sees it

item.description: After 24 h travel we’re back home to our wonderful German bed with comforter instead of sheets! I’d take a picture, but my wife has already collapsed into it.
item.source:markdown: After 24 h travel we’re back home to our wonderful German bed with comforter instead of sheets! I’d take a picture, but my wife has already collapsed into it.

item.description: @Regensbloggerin @jrsofty @cliff1976 As a mixed US/EU couple, we can usually together use the US or the EU line, but with exceptions on both sides of the Atlantic. Never hurts to ask.
item.source:markdown: @Regensbloggerin @jrsofty @cliff1976 As a mixed US/EU couple, we can usually together use the US or the EU line, but with exceptions on both sides of the Atlantic. Never hurts to ask.

item.description: @jrsofty At least at Schiphol 😀
item.source:markdown: @jrsofty At least at Schiphol 😀

item.description: Landed at AMS. Lines at passport control normal, as usual the EU line with residence card took 5 minutes https://t.co/W8zJyHjmuG
item.source:markdown: Landed at AMS. Lines at passport control normal, as usual the EU line with residence card took 5 minutes https://t.co/W8zJyHjmuG

item.description: @cncx And I thought my mom’s dog is spoiled 😂🐶
item.source:markdown: @cncx And I thought my mom’s dog is spoiled 😂🐶

item.description: @HonourableHusba By the time they reach us they’re tired, peaceful, and hungry.
item.source:markdown: @HonourableHusba By the time they reach us they’re tired, peaceful, and hungry.

item.description: When you give your people free rein over social media… 😀 Return traffic from the Wacken festival is our busiest day of the year on the Autobahn, we’re happy it’s back after 2 years! https://t.co/EUAmIPyRCX
item.source:markdown: When you give your people free rein over social media… 😀 Return traffic from the Wacken festival is our busiest day of the year on the Autobahn, we’re happy it’s back after 2 years! https://t.co/EUAmIPyRCX

item.description: @amberlough AFAIK, while the card will do for a lot of things, it’s not official ID (like for crossing borders). Only country of citizenship can issue official ID.
item.source:markdown: @amberlough AFAIK, while the card will do for a lot of things, it’s not official ID (like for crossing borders). Only country of citizenship can issue official ID.

item.description: @amberlough Border guards don’t issue passports, they just look at them! 😛
item.source:markdown: @amberlough Border guards don’t issue passports, they just look at them! 😛

item.description: @HejM0 Our electricity bills are currently negotiated monthly so we get those increases in real time 😀 (market is so jumpy it makes no sense to lock in future prices, say our consultants)
item.source:markdown: @HejM0 Our electricity bills are currently negotiated monthly so we get those increases in real time 😀 (market is so jumpy it makes no sense to lock in future prices, say our consultants)

item.description: @tessaapproves @bzbear2 @HamburgSent German waitstaff are likely covered by the collective bargaining agreement between the local DEHOGA and the union NGG. US waitstaff are likely not covered by such an agreement.
item.source:markdown: @tessaapproves @bzbear2 @HamburgSent German waitstaff are likely covered by the collective bargaining agreement between the local DEHOGA and the union NGG. US waitstaff are likely not covered by such an agreement.

item.description: Our energy consultant just told us to expect our monthly commercial natural gas payments to increase by 2-1/2 times shortly. #NordStream1
item.source:markdown: Our energy consultant just told us to expect our monthly commercial natural gas payments to increase by 2-1/2 times shortly. #NordStream1

item.description: @MCinHD Just don’t let them make you Schatzmeister:in. My wife‘s been in online banking 3 times during her vacation for her Verein.
item.source:markdown: @MCinHD Just don’t let them make you Schatzmeister:in. My wife‘s been in online banking 3 times during her vacation for her Verein.

item.description: @bzbear2 @lazycuttlefish @HamburgSent Not sure how my tweet about bedding devolved into a discussion of restaurant norms. I personally never tip in bed and have never been kicked out early. 😁
item.source:markdown: @bzbear2 @lazycuttlefish @HamburgSent Not sure how my tweet about bedding devolved into a discussion of restaurant norms. I personally never tip in bed and have never been kicked out early. 😁

item.description: Happy to have started a, erm, wide-ranging discussion. We’re just looking forward to our German bed with a comforter instead of a topsheet. https://t.co/W5FYiNsosq
item.source:markdown: Happy to have started a, erm, wide-ranging discussion. We’re just looking forward to our German bed with a comforter instead of a topsheet. https://t.co/W5FYiNsosq

item.description: Biggest complaint I’ve heard lately from German travelers in the US: American bedsheets are terrible. At this point I can’t argue.
item.source:markdown: Biggest complaint I’ve heard lately from German travelers in the US: American bedsheets are terrible. At this point I can’t argue.

item.description: @cliff1976 @swaggoner Charge 30€ anyway
item.source:markdown: @cliff1976 @swaggoner Charge 30€ anyway
